comments:
Steps to reproduce:
TPTP driver: TPTP-4.3.0200610090100
JRE: IBM JRE 1.5 SR3
When trying to profile a remote Junit test case (deployment to remote host i.e org.eclipse.hyades.logging.core.tests to Windows XP machine) I get the following two errors in my error log.  The data does show up in the statistics views however it is unclear whether the NPE is corrupting the data.
1) Widget Disposed

I was also getting a JVM Dump during this use case which showed up in the console view. However, the workaround is to shut down the Eclispe workbench and kill any background java processes. After doing that the JVM Dump is gone and the results are as described above. I'm not sure this is relevant but thought I would add it to the defect for more info.
Retarget to future due to resource limitation.
Hi Bing. I have transferred my bugs to you for triage. Thanks.
